response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's a game-changer in its field and I believe it could significantly benefit your operations or personal endeavors. Given its value to you, which I estimate to be $15,000, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its market value of $15,000 and offers you an exceptional opportunity to acquire it. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. I look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 12000}
